hints.content:
Each bill has a different value.

Dollar name | Picture | Value
- | - | -
One dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/526e9b19f2c39d0d908b6c531d510186f6e93e97.png) | $\$1$
Five dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/5069901d0226c2c5f1c3e73b2b5d7e48ee1e1eee.png) | $\$5$
Ten dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/35b0286a92e1825d39af39b5e362e5d9674eb00d.png) | $\$10$
Twenty dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/66f0febd8ba41a0e3413f72b2f1fc2d54a3819de.png) | $\$20$

Which bill matches the image?

Let's find out how much money Zang has.

$\underbrace{\$\blueE{1} + \$\blueE{1}}_{\blueE{2}{\text{ one dollar bills}}}+\underbrace{\$\purpleD{5}}_{\purpleD{1}{\text{ five dollar bill}}} + \underbrace{\$\maroonD{10} + \$\maroonD{10} + \$\maroonD{10}}_{\maroonD{3}{\text{ ten dollar bills}}}= \$37$

Zang has $\$37$.

Now, let's add the amount of money Zang earned mowing lawns:


![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/0354c9ba52dc61658ccf6709af31a30be1394b0b.png)


$\underbrace{\$37}_{{\text{Zang's money}}} + \underbrace{\$\maroonD{10}}_{\maroonD{1}{\text{ ten dollar bill}}} + \underbrace{\$\purpleD{5}}_{\purpleD{1}{\text{ five dollar bill}}} + \underbrace{\$\blueE{1} + \$\blueE{1} + \$\blueE{1} + \$\blueE{1}}_{\blueE{4}{\text{ one dollar bills}}} = \$56$

Zang has $\$56$ after he mowed lawns.

question.content:
Zang has $2$ one dollar bills, $1$ five dollar bill, and $3$ ten dollar bills.  

After mowing lawns, he earned this much money:

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/0354c9ba52dc61658ccf6709af31a30be1394b0b.png)

**How much money does Zang have in all? **
